response.explain: The task goal is to cook a frozen pie. From the observed objects, we can see that the cheese tart is inside the fridge and it is frozen. The fridge is currently closed. The oven is also closed and turned off. The robot's inventory is currently empty.

(2) Take the cheese tart from the fridge
(3) Close the fridge
(4) Open the oven
(5) Put the cheese tart in the oven
(6) Close the oven
(7) Turn on the oven to cook the cheese tart
